html:
10.30.18  6:00 pm   I seem to have gotten a YouTube friend request from you after commenting that I was the 20,000th viewer of your most recent video. Is this really you?

     no, fake

10.30.18  6:00 pm   how does the road in the new song never end if it has a beginning?

     it would be a ray then wouldn't it

10.30.18  5:59 pm   do you sharp your nines?

     the best analogy i could give here is the spoon - fork analogy. do you forkify your spoons? not necessary, when you have forks also

10.30.18  5:44 pm   Is there something wrong with you?

     yes, and you also

10.30.18  5:39 pm   you said in your song "long long long journey" that you put some trousers on and slipped out your window but unless you live in a bungalow or you have very soft padding on the ground(which the beautiful created animation didn't show) so im saying right now its canon you live in a bungalow.just try to deny it 

     i thought that story was about you

10.30.18  5:37 pm   Is there a reason you use neon animation?

     what is that

10.30.18  5:20 pm   What's your favorite type of paper?

     graph

10.30.18  5:09 pm   Why is there pumpkin flavored everything?

     that is a backup plan in case we lose track of all the pumpkins

10.30.18  5:00 pm   What does it all mean?

     everything

10.30.18  4:14 pm   how to defeat the sad when you were born and raised in it

     you should know all its strengths, and weaknesses by now

10.30.18  3:21 pm   i'm not sure if i understand the process of your songs. you said the new song was originally written last week, does that mean it's brand new?

     yes

      i thought i remembered that your plan was to work your way through all of the old songs that you wrote, is that not still the plan or am i missing something?

     it would be nice to record everything i ever wrote, but i also keep writing. another crazy trick is to take old songs and fix them

10.30.18  2:55 pm   Do you want to get any songs onto vinyl?

     i've never had the desire to, but i'm sure eventually i will cave in due to pressure from society

10.30.18  2:26 pm   Are u gonna write a book

     hopefully something a bit more interactive

10.30.18  1:32 pm   What brand are your studio monitors? They seem pretty simple and cool

     that's just the way they look. if you heard how they sound you would probably throw them in the garbage, until you realize they are an excellent platform to hold items upon

10.30.18  12:57 pm   out of all the songs you've written, do you have a favorite?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.30.18  12:36 pm   do you like climbing trees?

     need to make more trees

10.30.18  11:43 am   what mic do you use? vocals sound tiiight

     i use a bad mic but i do a lot of work to correct it

10.30.18  11:20 am   is it okay being a person that a lot of people think has all the answers

     could be good exercise

10.30.18  11:10 am   how do ants communicate? electrical signals?

     the communication already took place before the universe began. they did all the communication in advance. a good bit of forsight

10.30.18  10:53 am   3 questions about the baguette, why, who and for what purpose? 

     2 of those are the same question and the other is not about the baguette

10.30.18  10:29 am   When its raining,what to you do?

     rejoice, celebrate

10.30.18  9:21 am   Why is your Youtube description "is slef", but Twitter is "is self"?

     for a sense of variety, and flavour

10.30.18  9:01 am   I'm starting a song with Em7, where would you go next?

     depends how long you wanna stay there for, and also what the world and melody is there

10.30.18  8:07 am   When will see more of your face?

     probably in 2 weeks

10.30.18  7:06 am   Why is 'color' not spelt 'colour'?

     your neighbour will plainly attest that it is

10.30.18  6:27 am   A NEW ALBUM????????? YOU CAN'T JUST DROP IT OUT OF NOWHERE! JESUS CHRIST BILL

     i prefer to call it a song. it's one song. to go with all the other songs

10.30.18  5:38 am   Should i focus my spare time on making music or drawing?

     sure

10.30.18  5:33 am   where the heck is that new album? i just got a notification from google i know it's out there somewhere

     it's a single. it would be nice if they called it a song, but it's nice that it's giving notifications

10.30.18  4:18 am   do you ever play a "bad" or "wrong" note/chord and think to yourself "wait, this sounds better than what I had in mind/already had"?

     yes, i discovered some time ago that that is actually the only thing that makes music possible at all

10.30.18  2:11 am   define your brain in 5 words?

     sometimes i behave like a donkey or similar

10.30.18  1:05 am   How does one deal with guilt good sir

      do more things you are not guilty about, so you will see your guilt average start to increase

10.30.18  1:01 am   if drum is shoe, does that mean all shoe are also drum? can this be expressed with an equation?

     both are ball. everything is balls

10.30.18  12:50 am   its almost halloween do you dress up or do you rock out in your basement all night?

      gotta get the next song written

10.30.18  12:19 am   I don't have a car, where should I drive to?

     your current location

10.29.18  11:46 pm   No question, I just like your songs. Thanks for sharing.

     oh you are very nice

10.29.18  11:32 pm   Should I go to sleep?

     sure

10.29.18  11:29 pm   do you have any still living artistic inspirations?

     yes

10.29.18  11:28 pm   what's your background in music?

     my background and foreground are both densely filled with music

have you been playing for a long time?

     yes

10.29.18  11:06 pm   would you ever write a musical?

     i've done many, assuming i know what a musical is, which from what i understand is not just music it needs to have non music in it to be considered a musical. if that is correct then i have done both music and musicals

10.29.18  10:45 pm   do you know where to find the full vidcon segment you did?

     no

10.29.18  10:30 pm   should i go do some poetry 

     yes

10.29.18  9:20 pm   How do you think?

     i'm not sure but i think it's some kind of electrical process. the reason i think this is because it sometimes reminds me of lightning, which i also don't understand

10.29.18  8:04 pm   when was the new song originally written?

     last week

10.29.18  7:10 pm   Hey Bill, how should I deal with EXTREME procrastination? I'm in my first year of Uni and I just can't seem to get much work done... :(

     maybe there is something else you would rather be doing

10.29.18  6:17 pm   Is there a quest in the millions of jingles and songs? Or is it just weird goodness?

     it's kind of like a who done it

10.29.18  5:57 pm   Your songs obviously have hidden metaphors, but do they always carry a theme? ie: When I get older. Do the metaphors in that song all tell a story, or are they just sporadic ideas floating around with a vague theme in mind?

     it's choose your own adventure

10.29.18  5:28 pm   What do you think of the 5 minutes ago theory? It's that one where the universe could have been created five minutes ago with fossils and memories and all other proof of the universe's age made to look like it's the age we think it is. I don't think I've ever heard you talk about it before.

     seems legit

10.29.18  5:24 pm   how to be a good?

     go to settings

10.29.18  5:15 pm   how many dimensions are there?

     as many as you can imagine

10.29.18  2:03 pm   what is your opinion humans?

     i think they could really take off
